Package CCAPI

Class Summary
Candle A candle. the financial library works only with candles, for most calculations inside the financial library, the close value is used.
ChartWindow  
DatabaseLayer  
FileDataSourceCSV  
FinancialLibrary A financial library implementation, provides technical analysis routines. please report all errors, extensions and bugfixes if possible.
LocalPortfolio  
NeuralAnalyzer This class is an example of how to create a neural net.
Option This is an Optionsschein class, as to be found in a list obtained through OSGetter
OSGetter OSGetter gets a list of Optionsscheine from the stuttgarter euwax servers.
OSGetterEuwax obtains the bnp paribas options from the european stock exchange
PersonalLogger  
Quote a quote object - contains a quote.
Transaction
